name: Todo App MCP Server
description: A comprehensive todo application with MongoDB backend, exposed via MCP for LLM integration

server.name: Todo App MCP Server
server.description: Manage your todos through natural language with full CRUD operations, filtering, and statistics

tools.name: create_todo
tools.description: Create a new todo item with title, description, priority, due date, and tags

tools.name: get_todos
tools.description: Get todos with filtering and pagination options

tools.name: get_todo
tools.description: Get a specific todo by its ID

tools.name: delete_todo
tools.description: Delete a todo by its ID

tools.name: toggle_todo
tools.description: Toggle the completion status of a todo

tools.name: get_todos_by_tag
tools.description: Get todos filtered by a specific tag

tools.name: get_todo_stats
tools.description: Get statistics about your todo list including completion rates and priority breakdown

prompts.name: create_todo_prompt
prompts.description: Template for creating new todos with all available options

prompts.name: manage_todos_prompt
prompts.description: Template for managing existing todos with various operations
